content: PR 300-HV2S Outdoor rotating laser level Outdoor rotary laser level with automatic vertical alignment and dual slope dial-in functions for leveling, aligning, grading and squaring tasks ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Laser layout tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Grading has never been this easy – digital slope entry in two planes, the automatic slope check and the automatic E-targeting function can make all grading applications a one-person operation When used with the PRA 30 remote control/laser receiver, the Hilti PR 300-HV2S rotating laser is a complete, more reliable outdoor layout tool for virtually any leveling, aligning and squaring tasks Built to last – shock-absorbing handles and receiver holder engineered to US Military standards (MIL-STD-810G) and with IP66 protection to help maintain laser accuracy in rough jobsite conditions Fast and automatic laser alignment thanks to the Auto Alignment System Surveillance mode – the tool monitors and corrects the vertical laser plane at regular intervals for most reliable performance Applications Leveling – roadworks, formwork, concrete pours, excavation, etc. Aligning – transferring building lines, aligning columns, façades Dual-slope grading – ramps, parking lots, pipes Squaring – formwork For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accuracy: ±0.02 in at 33 ft Operating range with laser receiver (diameter): 7 - 1969 ft Laser class: < 4.85 mW, 620-690 nm, Class 2 (EN 60825), Class II (FDA CFR 21 art. 1040) Technical Data | Accuracy | ±0.02 in at 33 ft | Operating range with laser receiver (diameter) | 7 - 1969 ft | Laser class | < 4.85 mW, 620-690 nm, Class 2 (EN 60825), Class II (FDA CFR 21 art. 1040) | Self leveling range at room temperature | +/-5° ° | Inclination setting X-axis - range | -20 - 8 % | Inclination setting Y-axis - range | -8 - 8 % | Rotation speed | 600 rpm | IP protection class | IP 66 (EN 60529) - battery compartment excluded | Operating temperature range | -4 - 122 °F | Maximum operating time | 25 h ### ITEMS- 3539255 - PR 300-HV2S AUTOMATIC TRIPOD KIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PR 300-HV2S Rotating laser - 1x Battery pack PRA 84 assy - 1x PUA 81 (02) Mains adapter - 1x PRA 300 EU Remote contr./laser rec. - 2x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x PRA 83 Laser receiver holder - 1x PR 300-HV2S Case - 1x PRA 90 Tripod - 1x PRA 84 HNA Battery pack assy - 1x PUA 81 (02) Mains adapter - 1x PA961 Telescopic staff - 3539256 - PR 300-HV2S LAYOUT KIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PR 300-HV2S Rotating laser - 1x Battery pack PRA 84 assy - 1x PUA 81 (02) Mains adapter - 1x PRA 300 EU Remote contr./laser rec. - 2x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x PRA 83 Laser receiver holder - 1x PR 300-HV2S Case - 1x PRA 750 Batter board adapter - 1x PRA 751 Batter board receiver holder - 1x PRA 20 EU Laser receiver - 2x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x Packing Instructions PR Batter-Board Kit - 2097584 - Rotating laser PR 300-HV2S - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PR 300-HV2S Rotating laser - 1x Battery pack PRA 84 assy - 1x PUA 81 (02) Mains adapter - 1x PRA 300 EU Remote contr./laser rec. - 2x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x PRA 83 Laser receiver holder - 1x PR 300-HV2S Case
